code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MileageForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[mileage,setMileage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const value=parseFloat(mileage.replace(",","."));if(!isNaN(value)&&value>=0){onSubmit(value);setMileage("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Digite a quilometragem do seu carro:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:mileage,onChange:e=>setMileage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Ex: 50000",min:"0",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Calcular"})]});};export default MileageForm;
